00036 function ViewImp($p_array,$p_cn) {
00037   include_once("preference.php");
00038   $periode=FormPeriodeMult($p_cn);
00039   foreach ( $p_array as $key=>$element) {
00040     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"VIEWIMP $key $element");
00041     ${"$key"}=$element;
00042   }
00043   if ( ! isset($type) ) return;
00044   $centr="";
00045   if ( $action=="viewhtml")  {
00046     echo '<FORM ACTION=impress.php METHOD="GET">';
00047     if ( $type=="jrn")
00048           $centr='<BR>Centralisé : 
00049              <INPUT TYPE="CHECKBOX" NAME="central" unchecked><BR>'; 
00050   }
00051   else {
00052     if ( $type=="jrn") {
00053       echo '<FORM ACTION=send_jrn_pdf.php METHOD="GET">';
00054           $centr='<BR>Centralisé : 
00055              <INPUT TYPE="CHECKBOX" NAME="central" unchecked><BR>'; 
00056     }
00057     if ( $type=="poste")
00058       echo '<FORM ACTION=send_poste_pdf.php METHOD="GET">';
00059   }
00060   echo $periode;
00061   echo '<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="type" value="'.$type.'">';
00062   echo '<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="action" value="'.$action.'">';
00063 
00064   echo $centr;
00065 
00066   if ( isset($filter))
00067     echo '<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="filter" value="'.$filter.'">';
00068   if ( isset ($p_id)) {
00069     echo '<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="p_id" value="'.$p_id.'">';
00070   } else {
00071     include_once("poste.php");
00072     echo "<BR>";
00073     echo PosteForm($p_cn);
00074     echo ' <BR>Tous les postes ';
00075     echo '<INPUT TYPE="checkbox" NAME="all_poste"><BR>';
00076   }
00077   echo '<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" name="print" Value="Executer">';
00078 
00079   echo '</FORM>';
00080   echo "</DIV>";
00081 }
00095 function Imp($p_array,$p_cn) {
00096   if ( ! isset($p_array['action'])) {
00097     echo_error ("IMP no action specified"); return;
00098   }
00099   if ( $p_array['action']=="viewhtml") {
00100     return ImpHtml($p_array,$p_cn);
00101   }
00102   echo_error ("IMP no action specified"); return;
00103 }
00117 function ImpHtml($p_array,$p_cn) 
00118 {
00119   foreach($p_array as $key=>$element) {
00120     ${"$key"}=$element;
00121     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"ImpHtml $key => $element");
00122   }
00123 
00124 
00125   $colvide="<TD></TD>";
00126   // formulaire
00127   if ( $type == "form" ) {
00128     if ( !isset ($periode)) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00129     $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($periode);
00130     $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select fo_id , 
00131                      fo_fr_id, 
00132                      fo_pos, 
00133                      fo_label, 
00134                      fo_formula,
00135                      fr_label from form 
00136                       inner join formdef on fr_id=fo_fr_id
00137                      where fo_fr_id=$p_id
00138                      order by fo_pos");
00139     $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00140     if ($Max==0) return $ret="";
00141     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00142       $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00143       $col=GetFormulaValue($p_cn,
00144                    $l_line['fo_label'],
00145                    $l_line['fo_formula'],$cond);
00146       echo "<div>";
00147       foreach ($col as $key=> $element) {
00148         echo "$element ";
00149       }
00150       echo "</div>";
00151     } //for ($i
00152 
00153   }//form
00154   if ($type=="poste") { 
00155     if ( ! isset ( $all_poste) && ! isset ( $poste )) return NO_POST_SELECTED;
00156     if ( !isset ($periode)) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00157     include_once("poste.php");
00158     $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($periode);
00159     $ret="" ;
00160     if ( isset ( $all_poste) ){ //choisit de voir tous les postes
00161       $r_poste=ExecSql($p_cn,"select pcm_val from tmp_pcmn");
00162       $nPoste=pg_numRows($r_poste);
00163       for ( $i=0;$i<$nPoste;$i++) {
00164         $t_poste=pg_fetch_array($r_poste,$i);
00165         $poste[]=$t_poste['pcm_val'];
00166       } 
00167     }      
00168     for ( $i =0;$i<count($poste);$i++) {
00169       list ($array,$tot_deb,$tot_cred)=GetDataPoste($p_cn,$poste[$i],$cond);
00170       if ( count($array) == 0) continue;
00171       $ret.=sprintf("<H2 class=\"info\">%d %s</H2>",
00172                     $poste[$i],GetPosteLibelle($p_cn,$poste[$i],1));
00173       $ret.="<TABLE style=\"border-bottom-style:solid; border-width:2px\" >";
00174       $i=0;
00175       foreach ($array as $col=>$element) {
00176         $i++;
00177         if ( $i %2 == 0) 
00178           $ret.="<tr class=\"even\">";
00179         else
00180           $ret.="<TR class=\"odd\">";
00181         $ret.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$element['j_date']);
00182         $ret.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$element['jr_internal']);
00183         //      $ret.=sprintf("<TD>jrn:%s</TD>",$element['jrn_name']);
00184         $ret.=sprintf("<TD>%s</TD>",$element['description']);
00185         if ( $element['j_debit']=='t') {
00186           $ret.=sprintf("<TD> debit</TD><TD ALIGN=\"right\">   % 8.2f</TD> $colvide",
00187                         $element['deb_montant']);
00188         } else {
00189           $ret.=sprintf("<TD>credit</TD> $colvide <TD ALIGN=\"right\">  % 8.2f</TD>",
00190                         $element['cred_montant']);
00191           
00192         }
00193         $ret.="</TR>";
00194       }//foreach
00195       
00196       $ret.=sprintf("$colvide $colvide $colvide $colvide ".
00197                     "<TD ALIGN=\"right\">% 8.2f</TD>".
00198                     "<TD ALIGN=\"right\">% 8.2f</TD>",
00199                     $tot_deb,
00200                     $tot_cred);
00201       $ret.="</TABLE>";
00202       $ret.="<p>Total débit :".$tot_deb."   Total Crédit:".$tot_cred."</p>";     
00203       if ( $tot_deb > $tot_cred ) {
00204         $solde_t="D"; 
00205         $solde=$tot_deb-$tot_cred;
00206         }else {
00207         $solde_t="C";
00208         $solde=$tot_cred-$tot_deb;
00209         }
00210       $ret.=" <p><B> Solde  $solde_t = ".$solde."</B></p>";
00211     }// for i
00212     return $ret;
00213   }//poste
00214   if ($type=="jrn") {
00215     if ( !isset ($periode)) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00216 
00217     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"imp html journaux");

00220       $array=GetDataJrn($p_cn,$p_array,$filter);
00221     }
00222     $cass="";
00223     $c=0;
00224 
00225     foreach ($array as $a=>$e2) {
00226       //      echo_debug($ret);
00227       
00228       //cassure entre op
00229       if ( $cass!=$e2['grp'] ) {
00230         $cass=$e2['grp'];
00231         $ret.='<TR style="background-color:#89BEFF"><TD>'.$e2['j_date']."</TD>";

00244       $ret.="</TR>";
00245     }
00246     echo_debug($ret);
00247 
00248     return $ret ;
00249   }//jrn

00265 function GetDataPoste($p_cn,$p_poste,$p_condition)
00266 {
00267   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,".
00268                "case when j_debit='t' then to_char(j_montant,'999999999.99') else ' ' end as deb_montant,".
00269                "case when j_debit='f' then to_char(j_montant,'999999999.99') else ' ' end as cred_montant,".
00270                " jr_comment as description,jrn_def_name as jrn_name,".
00271                "j_debit, jr_internal ".
00272 //             " case when j_debit='t' then 'debit' else 'credit' end as debit".
00273                " from jrnx left join jrn_def on jrn_def_id=j_jrn_def ".
00274                " left join jrn on jr_grpt_id=j_grpt".
00275                " where j_poste=".$p_poste." and ".$p_condition.
00276                " order by j_date::date");
00277   $array=array();
00278   $tot_cred=0;
00279   $tot_deb=0;
00280   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00281   if ( $Max == 0 ) return null;
00282   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00283     $array[]=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00284     if ($array[$i]['j_debit']=='t') {
00285       $tot_deb+=$array[$i]['deb_montant'] ;
00286     } else {
00287       $tot_cred+=$array[$i]['cred_montant'] ;
00288     }
00289   }
00290   return array($array,$tot_deb,$tot_cred);
00291 }
00306 function GetDataJrn($p_cn,$p_array,$filter=YES)
00307 {
00308   if ( !isset ($p_array['periode']) ) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00309 
00310   if ( $filter==YES) {
00311     if ( ! isset ( $p_array['central'])){
00312       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode']);
00313       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00314                 j_montant as montant,j_debit as debit,j_poste as poste,".
00315                "j_text as description,j_grpt as grp,jr_comment as comment,
00316                 j_rapt as oc,jr_internal from jrnx left join jrn on ".
00317                "jr_grpt_id=j_grpt where j_jrn_def=".$p_array['p_id'].
00318                " and ".$cond." order by j_date::date,j_grpt,j_debit desc");
00319     } else {
00320       // create 
00321       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode'],"c_periode");
00322 
00323       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select to_char(c_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00324                 c_montant as montant,c_debit as debit,c_poste as poste,".
00325                    "c_description as description,c_grp as grp,c_comment as comment,
00326                 c_rapt as oc,c_internal as jr_internal from centralized left join jrn on ".
00327                    "jr_grpt_id=c_grp where c_jrn_def=".$p_array['p_id']." and ".
00328                    $cond." order by c_id,c_date,c_grp,c_debit desc");
00329     }
00330     
00331   } // if filter == YES
00332   if ( $filter == NO) {
00333     if ( ! isset ($p_array['central']) ) {
00334       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode']);
00335       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00336                 j_montant as montant,j_debit as debit,j_poste as poste,".
00337                    "j_text as description,j_grpt as grp,jr_comment as comment,
00338                 j_rapt as oc,jr_internal from jrnx left join jrn on ".
00339                    "jr_grpt_id=j_grpt where ".
00340                    $cond." order by j_date::date,j_grpt,j_debit desc");
00341     } else {
00342       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode'],"c_periode");
00343 
00344       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select to_char(c_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00345                 c_montant as montant,c_debit as debit,c_poste as poste,".
00346                    "c_description as description,c_grp as grp,c_comment as comment,
00347                 c_rapt as oc,c_internal as jr_internal from centralized left join jrn on ".
00348                    "jr_grpt_id=c_grp where ".
00349                    $cond." order by c_id,c_date,c_grp,c_debit desc");
00350     
00351     } 
00352   }// filter == no
00353   $array=array();
00354   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00355   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00356     $array[]=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00357   }
00358   return $array;
00359 }
00372 function CreatePeriodeCond($p_periode,$p_field=" j_tech_per") {
00373   if ( count($p_periode) == 1) {
00374     return $p_field."=".$p_periode[0];
00375   }
00376 
00377   $cond_periode=" $p_field in (";
00378   // condition periode
00379   $old=0;
00380   $follow=0;
00381   foreach ( $p_periode as $per) {
00382     if ( $old == 0) { 
00383       $old=$per;
00384       $follow=1;
00385       continue;
00386     }
00387     if ( $per == $old+1 ) { 
00388       $old=$per;
00389       $follow++;
00390     }
00391     
00392   }// foreach
00393   if ( count($p_periode) == $follow) {
00394     $cond=$p_field." >= ".$p_periode[0].' and '.$p_field.' <= '.$p_periode[count($p_periode)-1];
00395     return $cond;
00396   }
00397 
00398   // condition periode
00399   foreach ( $p_periode as $per) {
00400     $cond_periode.=$per.",";
00401   }
00402   $cond_periode=substr($cond_periode,0,strlen($cond_periode)-1);
00403   $cond_periode.=")";
00404   return $cond_periode;
00405 }
00421 function GetDataJrnPdf($p_cn,$p_array,$p_limit,$p_offset)
00422 {
00423   echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"GetDataJrnPdf");
00424 
00425   if ( !isset ($p_array['periode']) ) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00426 
00427   if ( $p_array['filter']==YES) {
00428     $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode']);
00429     if ( ! isset ($p_array['central']) ) {
00430       // Journaux non centralisés
00431     $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select j_id,to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00432                       jr_internal,
00433                 case j_debit when 't' then j_montant::text else '   ' end as deb_montant,
00434                 case j_debit when 'f' then j_montant::text else '   ' end as cred_montant,
00435                 j_debit as debit,j_poste as poste,jr_montant , ".
00436                "pcm_lib as description,j_grpt as grp,jr_comment ,
00437                 jr_rapt as oc, j_tech_per as periode from jrnx left join jrn on ".
00438                  "jr_grpt_id=j_grpt ".
00439                  " left join tmp_pcmn on pcm_val=j_poste ".
00440                 " where j_jrn_def=".$p_array['p_id'].
00441                " and ".$cond." order by j_date::date asc,jr_internal,j_debit desc".
00442                " limit ".$p_limit." offset ".$p_offset);
00443     }else {
00444       // Journaux centralisés
00445       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode'],"c_periode");
00446       $Sql="select c_id as j_id,
00447             c_j_id,
00448             to_char (c_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date ,
00449             c_internal as jr_internal,
00450             case c_debit when 't' then c_montant::text else '   ' end as deb_montant,
00451             case c_debit when 'f' then c_montant::text else '   ' end as cred_montant,
00452             c_debit as j_debit,
00453             c_poste as poste,
00454             pcm_lib as description,
00455             jr_comment,
00456             jr_montant,
00457             c_grp as grp,
00458             c_comment as comment,
00459             c_rapt as oc,
00460             c_periode as periode 
00461             from centralized left join jrn on ".
00462                 "jr_grpt_id=c_grp left join tmp_pcmn on pcm_val=c_poste where ".
00463                 " c_jrn_def=".$p_array['p_id']." and ".
00464                 $cond." order by c_id ";
00465     $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$Sql." limit ".$p_limit." offset ".$p_offset);
00466 
00467     }
00468   } else {
00469     // Grand Livre
00470     if (! isset($p_array['central'])) {
00471       // Non centralisé
00472       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode']);
00473       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select j_id,to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00474                       jr_internal,
00475                 case j_debit when 't' then j_montant::text else '   ' end as deb_montant,
00476                 case j_debit when 'f' then j_montant::text else '   ' end as cred_montant,
00477                 j_debit as debit,j_poste as poste,".
00478                "pcm_lib as description,j_grpt as grp,jr_comment as jr_comment,
00479                 jr_montant,
00480                 jr_rapt as oc, j_tech_per as periode from jrnx left join jrn on ".
00481                  "jr_grpt_id=j_grpt left join tmp_pcmn on pcm_val=j_poste where ".
00482                "  ".$cond." order by j_date::date,j_grpt,j_debit desc".
00483                " limit ".$p_limit." offset ".$p_offset);
00484 
00485     } else {
00486       // Centralisé
00487       $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode'],"c_periode");
00488       $Sql="select c_id as j_id,
00489             c_j_id,
00490             to_char (c_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date ,
00491             c_internal as jr_internal,
00492             case c_debit when 't' then c_montant::text else '   ' end as deb_montant,
00493             case c_debit when 'f' then c_montant::text else '   ' end as cred_montant,
00494             c_debit as j_debit,
00495             c_poste as poste,
00496             pcm_lib as description,
00497             jr_comment,
00498             jr_montant,
00499             c_grp as grp,
00500             c_comment as comment,
00501             c_rapt as oc,
00502             c_periode as periode 
00503             from centralized left join jrn on ".
00504                 "jr_grpt_id=c_grp left join tmp_pcmn on pcm_val=c_poste where ".
00505                 $cond." order by c_id ";
00506     $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$Sql." limit ".$p_limit." offset ".$p_offset);
00507     } // Grand Livre
00508   }
00509 
00510 
00511   $array=array();
00512   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00513   if ($Max==0) return null;
00514   $case="";
00515   $tot_deb=0;
00516   $tot_cred=0;
00517   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00518     $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00519     $mont_deb=($line['deb_montant']!=0)?sprintf("% 8.2f",$line['deb_montant']):"";
00520     $mont_cred=($line['cred_montant']!=0)?sprintf("% 8.2f",$line['cred_montant']):"";
00521     $jr_montant=($line['jr_montant']!=0)?sprintf("% 8.2f",$line['jr_montant']):"";
00522     $tot_deb+=$line['deb_montant'];
00523     $tot_cred+=$line['cred_montant'];
00524     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__," GetJrnDataPdf : mont_Deb ".$mont_deb);
00525     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__," GetJrnDataPdf : mont_cred ".$mont_cred);
00526 
00527     if ( $case != $line['grp'] ) {
00528       $case=$line['grp'];
00529       $array[]=array (
00530                       'j_id'=>$line['j_id'],
00531                       'j_date' => $line['j_date'],
00532                       'internal'=>$line['jr_internal'],
00533                       'deb_montant'=>'',
00534                       'cred_montant'=>'<b><i>'.$jr_montant.'</i></b>',
00535                       'description'=>'<b><i>'.$line['jr_comment'].'</i></b>',
00536                       'poste' => $line['oc'],
00537                       'periode' =>$line['periode'] );
00538 
00539       $array[]=array (
00540                       'j_id'=>$line['j_id'], 
00541                       'j_date' => '',
00542                       'internal'=>'',
00543                       'deb_montant'=>$mont_deb,
00544                       'cred_montant'=>$mont_cred,
00545                       'description'=>$line['description'],
00546                       'poste' => $line['poste'],
00547                       'periode' => $line['periode']
00548                       );
00549     
00550     }else {
00551       $array[]=array (
00552                       'j_id'=>$line['j_id'],
00553                       'j_date' => '',
00554                       'internal'=>'',
00555                       'deb_montant'=>$mont_deb,
00556                       'cred_montant'=>$mont_cred,
00557                       'description'=>$line['description'],
00558                       'poste' => $line['poste'],
00559                       'periode' => $line['periode']);
00560 
00561     }
00562       
00563 
00564   }
00565   echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"Total debit $tot_deb,credit $tot_cred");
00566   $a=array($array,$tot_deb,$tot_cred);
00567  return $a;

00580 function GetDataGrpt($p_cn,$p_array)
00581 {
00582   if ( !isset ($p_array['periode']) ) return NO_PERIOD_SELECTED;
00583   $cond=CreatePeriodeCond($p_array['periode']);
00584   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select distinct ".
00585                " j_grpt as grp".
00586                " from jrnx ".
00587                " where j_jrn_def=".$p_array['p_id'].
00588                " and ".$cond." order by j_grpt");
00589   $array=array();
00590   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00591   $case="";
00592   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00593     $array[]=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00594   }
00595   return $array;
00596 }
00597 
00614 function GetRappel($p_cn,$p_jrnx_id,$p_jrn_id,$p_exercice,$which,$p_type,$p_central) 
00615 {
00616   include_once("preference.php");
00617 
00618   if ( $which == LAST) 
00619     $cmp="<="; 
00620   else
00621     $cmp="<";
00622 
00623   if ( $p_type == 1 ) {
00624     // Vue filtree => Journaux
00625     if ( $p_central == 0 ) { // Vue non centralisée
00626           return array(0,0);
00627     } // p_central == 0
00628 
00629     //     Vue filtree => Journaux & Jrn centralisé 
00630     if ( $p_central == 1 ) {
00631       $c_line=CountSql($p_cn,"select * from centralized left join parm_periode on c_periode=p_id ".
00632                        " where c_jrn_def=$p_jrn_id and  p_exercice='".$p_exercice."'".
00633                        " and c_order $cmp $p_jrnx_id ");
00634       
00635       if ($c_line == 0 ) { return array (0,0); }
00636       $sql="select sum(c_montant) as tot_amount ".
00637         " from centralized ".
00638         " left join parm_periode on c_periode=p_id ".
00639         " inner join jrn on jr_grpt_id=c_grp ".
00640         " where c_jrn_def=$p_jrn_id and ".
00641         " p_exercice='".$p_exercice."'".
00642         " and c_order $cmp $p_jrnx_id " ;
00643       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql." and c_debit='t' ");
00644       if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) 
00645         $deb=0;
00646       else {
00647         $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00648         $deb=$line['tot_amount'];
00649       }
00650       
00651       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql." and c_debit='f' ");
00652       if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) 
00653         $cred=0;
00654       else {
00655         
00656         $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00657         $cred=$line['tot_amount'];
00658       }
00659       echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"MONTANT $deb,$cred");
00660       $a=array($deb,$cred);
00661       return $a;
00662 
00663     }
00664   } // Type = jrn
00665   if ($p_type==0 ) { // Si Grand Livre, prendre donnée centralisée{
00666     if ( $p_central == 1) {
00667       $c_line=CountSql($p_cn,"select * from centralized left join parm_periode on c_periode=p_id ".
00668                        "where p_exercice='".$p_exercice."'".
00669                        " and c_id $cmp $p_jrnx_id ");
00670       
00671       if ($c_line == 0 ) { return array (0,0); }
00672       $sql="select sum(c_montant) as tot_amount ".
00673         " from centralized ".
00674         " left join parm_periode on c_periode=p_id ".
00675         " where ".
00676         " p_exercice='".$p_exercice."'".
00677         " and c_order $cmp $p_jrnx_id " ;
00678       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql." and c_debit='t' ");
00679       if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) 
00680         $deb=0;
00681       else {
00682         $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00683         $deb=$line['tot_amount'];
00684       }
00685       
00686       $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql." and c_debit='f' ");
00687       if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) 
00688         $cred=0;
00689       else {
00690         
00691         $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00692         $cred=$line['tot_amount'];
00693       }
00694       echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__,"MONTANT $deb,$cred");
00695       $a=array($deb,$cred);
00696       return $a;
00697     } // central == 1
00698     else // Donnée non centralisée => pas de rappel
00699       {
00700         if ($p_central== 0) { // Si Grand Livre, prendre donnée non centralisée{
00701           return array(0,0);
00702         }
00703       }//else
00704   } // if type==0
00705   
00706 }
00707 
00724 function ParseFormula($p_cn,$p_label,$p_formula,$p_start,$p_end,$p_eval=true) {
00725   if ( CheckFormula($p_formula) == false) {
00726     if ( $p_eval == true)
00727       return array('desc'=>$p_label.'  Erreur Formule!',
00728                 'montant'=>0);
00729     else
00730       return $p_formula;
00731     
00732   }
00733 
00734   if ( $p_start == $p_end ) 
00735     $cond=" j_tech_per = $p_start ";
00736   else
00737     $cond = "(j_tech_per >= $p_start and j_tech_per <= $p_end) ";
00738   
00739   while (ereg("(\[[0-9]*%*\])",$p_formula,$e) == true) {
00740     include_once("class_poste.php");
00741     // remove the [ ] 
00742     $x=$e;
00743     $e[0]=str_replace ("[","",$e[0]);
00744     $e[0]=str_replace ("]","",$e[0]);
00745     // If there is a FROM clause we must recompute 
00746     // the time cond
00747     if ( ereg ("FROM=[0-9]+\.[0-9]+", $p_formula,$afrom) == true ){
00748       // There is a FROM clause 
00749       // then we must modify the cond for the periode
00750       $from=str_replace("FROM=","",$afrom[0]);
00751       // Get the periode 
00752       $from=getPeriodeFromMonth($p_cn,$from);
00753 
00754       //  Compute the cond
00755       if ( $from == $p_end ) 
00756         $cond=" j_tech_per = $from ";
00757       else
00758         $cond = "(j_tech_per >= $from and j_tech_per <= $p_end) ";
00759       // We remove FROM out of the p_formula
00760       $p_formula=substr_replace($p_formula,"",strpos($p_formula,"FROM"));
00761     }
00762     // Get sum of account
00763     $P=new poste($p_cn,$e[0]);
00764     $i=$P->GetSolde($cond);
00765     $p_formula=str_replace($x,$i,$p_formula);
00766   }
00767 
00768   // $p_eval is true then we eval and returns result
00769   if ( $p_eval == true) {
00770     $p_formula="\$result=".$p_formula.";";
00771     echo_debug('impress_inc.php',__LINE__, $p_formula);
00772     
00773     eval("$p_formula");
00774     $aret=array('desc'=>$p_label,
00775                 'montant'=>$result);
00776     return $aret;
00777   } else {
00778     // $p_eval is false we returns only the string
00779     return $p_formula;
00780   }
00781 }
00797 function GetFormulaValue($p_cn,$p_label,$p_formula,$p_cond) 
00798 {
00799   $aret=array();
00800   $l_debit=0;
00801   $l_credit=0;
00802     // somme debit
00803   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select sum (j_montant) as montant from
00804                       jrnx where $p_cond and j_debit='t' and j_poste like '$p_formula'");
00805   if (pg_NumRows($Res)==0){
00806     $l_debit=0;                   
00807   } else {
00808     $l=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00809     $l_debit=$l['montant'];
00810       }
00811   // somme credit
00812   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select sum (j_montant) as montant from
00813                       jrnx where $p_cond and j_debit='f' and j_poste like '$p_formula'");
00814   if (pg_NumRows($Res)==0) {
00815     $l_credit=0;                   
00816   } else {
00817     $l=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00818     $l_credit=$l['montant'];
00819   }
00820 
00821   if ( $l_credit==$l_debit) {
00822     $aret=array('desc' => $p_label,
00823                 'montant' => '0',
00824                 'cmontant'=>0);
00825   }
00826   if ( $l_credit < $l_debit) {
00827     $l2=sprintf("% .2f",$l_debit-$l_credit);
00828     $aret=array('desc' => $p_label,
00829                 'montant' => $l2,
00830                 'cmontant'=>$l2);
00831   }
00832   if ( $l_credit>$l_debit) {
00833     $l2=sprintf("(% .2f)",$l_credit-$l_debit);
00834     $aret=array('desc' => $p_label,
00835                 'montant' => $l2,
00836                 'cmontant'=> $l_debit-$l_credit);
00837 
00838   }
00839   return $aret;
00840 }
00852 function CheckFormula($p_string) {
00853   // the ereg gets too complex if we want to add a test
00854   // for parenthesis, math function...
00855   // So I prefer remove them before testing
00856   $p_string=str_replace("round","",$p_string);
00857   $p_string=str_replace("abs","",$p_string);
00858   $p_string=str_replace("(","",$p_string);
00859   $p_string=str_replace(")","",$p_string);
00860   // for  the inline test like $a=(cond)?value:other;
00861   $p_string=str_replace("?","+",$p_string);
00862   $p_string=str_replace(":","+",$p_string);
00863   $p_string=str_replace(">=","+",$p_string);
00864   $p_string=str_replace("<=","+",$p_string);
00865   $p_string=str_replace(">","+",$p_string);
00866   $p_string=str_replace("<","+",$p_string);
00867   // eat Space 
00868   $p_string=str_replace(" ","",$p_string);
00869 
00870   if ( ereg ("^(\\$[a-zA-Z]*[0-9]*=){0,1}((\[{0,1}[0-9]+\.*[0-9]*%{0,1}\]{0,1})+ *([+-\*/])* *(\[{0,1}[0-9]+\.*[0-9]*%{0,1}\]{0,1})*)*(([+-\*/])*\\$([a-zA-Z])+[0-9]*([+-\*/])*)* *( *FROM=[0-9][0-0].20[0-9][0-9]){0,1}$",$p_string) == false)
00871     {
00872       return false;
00873     } else {
00874       return true;
00875   }
00876 }
